Html:
Hello,
I need to Export Updates from one WPP/WSUS and Import these Updates into a different WPP.

Import failed with "Verification of File-Signature failed".

How could I do this ?

Hi,

can you use the different WSUS/WPP as an Downstream WSUS? If yes, this is the best way to bring Updates from one to another WPP/WSUS.

Hello Winfried,

No, i could not use it as a Downstreamserver, because the WSUS-Servers are in complete different Networks. One WSUS is in my enviroment (for Testing and generating Packages) and the other WSUS -Servers are at customer-locations.

I didn't understand why the import-function does check the Signing, I didn't see a reason for that. Importing an Package is really the same then generating a package from scratch and so it would be better, if the import-function would do a resign of the package.

Best regards
Ingo
